short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add scroll to top bar when hovering over a scrollbar of the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hover over the scrollbar and click on the bar that appears to scroll to the top of the page. Click on it again and the scrolling will return to the previous position.
